fields.value: Matching SIPO patents to Chinese listed firms ("Main Board")

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Matching SIPO patents to Chinese listed firms ("Main Board").

Please refer to the user documentation "Chinese Patent Database User Documentation: Matching SIPO Patents to Chinese Publicly-Listed Companies and Subsidiaries" for more details about this dataset.  
Alternative data access: https://sites.google.com/site/sipopdb/home/SIPO_listed

fields.value:
User Suggested citation for the "Matched Patents" and "Calculated Variables" data files:

He, Z.-L., Tong, T.W., Zhang, Y., & He, W. 2016. Constructing a Chinese patent database of listed firms in China: Descriptions, lessons, and insights. Journal of Economics & Management Strategy. Forthcoming.

files.description: Data file is in tab delimited format. Please use the import function of Excel or Stata to load data into memory. 57 calculated variables (firm-level) based on 191,325 confirmed true matches, with both Chinese and English company names
files.label: Calculated Variables.txt

dataFile.description: Data file is in tab delimited format. Please use the import function of Excel or Stata to load data into memory. 57 calculated variables (firm-level) based on 191,325 confirmed true matches, with both Chinese and English company names

files.description: He, Z.-L., Tong, T.W., Zhang, Y., & He, W. 2016. Constructing a Chinese patent database of listed firms in China: Descriptions, lessons, and insights. Journal of Economics & Management Strategy. Forthcoming.
files.label: JEMS - Constructing a Chinese Patent Database of Listed Firms in China.pdf

dataFile.filename: JEMS - Constructing a Chinese Patent Database of Listed Firms in China.pdf
dataFile.description: He, Z.-L., Tong, T.W., Zhang, Y., & He, W. 2016. Constructing a Chinese patent database of listed firms in China: Descriptions, lessons, and insights. Journal of Economics & Management Strategy. Forthcoming.

files.description: Data file is in tab delimited format. Please use the import function of Excel or Stata to load data into memory. 222,651 matched patents (among this, 191,325 are confirmed true matches with manual check)
files.label: Matched Patents.txt
